# idsec_sia_workspaces_target_set (Data Source)

SIA Workspaces Target Set data source, reads target set information and metadata, based on the id of the target set.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "idsec_sia_workspaces_target_sets" "example_target_set" {
  id = var.target_set_id
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) ID of the target set to retrieve

### Optional

- `description` (String) Description about the target set
- `enable_certificate_validation` (Boolean) Whether to enable certificate validation for the target set
- `name` (String) The actual target set name / url
- `provision_format` (String) Provisioning format for the target set ephemeral users
- `secret_id` (String) Secret id of the target set
- `secret_type` (String) Secret type of the target set
- `type` (String) Type of the target set
